document_data.name: Dog pepper
document_data.mainbody: '''Dog pepper''' was a diversionary tool used by [[thieves]] to distract [[dog]]s, similar to [[aniseed]] though comparatively less effective.
document_data.Description: Dog pepper came in small packets, holding enough to cover a {{SI|10|ft}} cube. When dropped on the ground behind them, a fleeing thief could potentially cover-up their scent, though they had better results when throwing dog pepper up into the air. Alternatively, a thief could throw dog pepper directly into the face of a hound to drive them hysterical for an hour.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Jack (Ravens Bluff)|Jack the Cripple]], a professional [[beggar]] in [[Ravens Bluff]] who faked being crippled, carried around a packet of dog pepper.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/105/The Living City: Misti's Moonlight Pawnshop|17}}
* [[Pete (Ravens Bluff)|Pete]], an androgynous pickpocket in Ravens Bluff, carried around a packet of dog pepper.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/105/The Living City: Misti's Moonlight Pawnshop|18}}
